overview: The girls of Barely Legal are back with their latest, masterful creation: Barely Legal #12. You'll pop a raging-ass-hard-on when you catch a faceful of this fresh collection of red-hot-boning. Prepare for a roller coaster of pulse-pounding, ball-tightening, filthy legal-teen sex.
tagline: Sweet Young Innocents Do Very Bad Things!
title: Barely Legal 12
